title: Lifemotiv
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Organic, Western, Take-out, European, Fusion, Polish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health-conscious restaurant on the second floor of Galeria Mokotów shopping mall, which is about 90% vegan. Main dishes are structured in motivs (ingredient combinations) which you then choose the form: salad, porridge (millet), vegan burger, salad burger, or wrap. All packaging is biodegradable. No refined sugar and only extra virgin olive and coconut oil . The fries are baked. Offers fairtrade coffee, tea, and cocoa.
